name: NY City FireFighter 2017
description:
Tap2Play, LLC is a wholly owned subsidiary of Tapinator, Inc.
Tapinator Inc. (Ticker: TAPM) develops and publishes games on mobile platforms. The Company’s portfolio includes over 250 mobile gaming titles that, collectively, have achieved over 350 million player downloads. Tapinator is headquartered in New York. For more info, visit Tapinator.com.
